msbt.message: There's something different about you today, but I can't quite put my finger on it. Did you get a haircut? , I'm just messing with you! I can see that your face had a little disagreement with some wasps.
Hey, it could be worse.Think of it this wayâ€”you've got the perfect excuse to stay inside and watch TV for, like, three days!

Yikes, what happened to your face?<10_4 /> Sorry, that was insensitive.Your face, um, seems perfectly fine. You can hardly notice it. Not that there's anything TO notice. Anyway, I'm sure you've faced bigger challenges before. Why do I keep saying face?!

Yikes, what happened to your face?<10_4 /> Sorry, that was insensitive.Your face, um, seems perfectly fine. But maybe it will be even MORE fine if you use this medicine. Well, you can hardly notice it. I'm sure you've faced bigger challenges before. Stop saying "face," you fool
Whew. Managed to save face. Still got it, !

There's something different about you today, but I can't quite put my finger on it. Did you get a haircut? , I'm just messing with you! I can see that your face had a little disagreement with some wasps.
All jokes aside, I think you'll appreciate this present I have for you. Here you go!

Don't tell anyone, but this kind of thing happens to me too.Here's the recipe for some medicine that'll make you as good as new! No need to thank me. Just think of me every time you look at your perfectly healed face in the mirror and we'll call it even.
